name: DCS WWII: Europe 1944
blurb: Welcome to DCS WWII: Europe 1944, the start of an exciting new flight simulation series!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Our heartfelt thanks, access to the backer section with weekly development updates, videos, and more, and a special BACKER medal on our official forums.
Everything at the previous level, plus early access to the game\u2019s closed beta.
Everything at the previous level, plus a digital copy of one additional flyable aircraft of your choice.
Everything at the $10 level, plus a digital copy of two additional flyable aircraft of your choice.
Everything at the $10 level, plus a digital copy of all flyable aircraft in the game (this will grow with the stretch goals and possibly end up offering a huge value!)
Everything at the $40 level, plus a spiral-bound copy of a complete aircraft manual for the plane of your choice.
ALPHA Tier 1. Everything at the $10 ORIGINAL level, plus a digital copy of all flyable aircraft in the initial release, plus ALPHA ACCESS.
Everything at the $40 level, plus a custom-designed project backer T-shirt.
MATRIX Tier 1. Everything at the $10 level, plus a digital copy of all flyable aircraft in the initial release, plus ONE extra (with the exception of the DCS World FW.190D-9).
ALPHA Tier 2. Everything at the $40 ORIGINAL level, plus a custom-designed project backer T-shirt, plus ALPHA ACCESS.
DCS World Tier 1. Everything at the $40 level, plus a digital copy of DCS World P-51D Mustang (on successful kickstarter completion).
Everything at the $40 level, plus a spiral-bound copy of a complete aircraft manual for the plane of your choice, and a hard copy of the game\u2019s air combat strategy and tactics manual.
Everything at the $50 level, plus a hard copy of the game\u2019s air combat strategy and tactics manual.
MATRIX Tier 2. Everything at the $10 level, plus a digital copy of all flyable aircraft in the initial release, plus any TWO extras.

Everything at the $10 level, plus a custom-designed project backer T-shirt and TWO digital copies of all flyable aircraft in the game (this will grow with the stretch goals and possibly end up offering a huge value!). Share with a friend!
DCS World Tier 2. Everything at the $50 level, plus a digital copy of DCS World FW-190D-9 with beta access (when available in early 2014).
MATRIX Tier 3. Everything at the $10 level, plus TWO digital copies of all flyable aircraft in the initial release (share with a friend!), plus ONE extra.
ALPHA Tier 3. Everything at the $50 ORIGINAL level, plus TWO digital copies of all flyable aircraft in the initial release, plus ALPHA ACCESS.
MATRIX Tier 4. Everything at the $10 level, plus a digital copy of all flyable aircraft in the initial release, plus any THREE extras.
Everything at the $40 level, plus a hard copy of the game\u2019s air combat strategy and tactics manual, and spiral-bound copies of complete aircraft manuals for two flyable aircraft in the game.

DCS World Tier 3. Everything at the $50 level, plus a digital copy of DCS World FW-190D-9 with beta access (when available in early 2014), and a digital copy of DCS World P-51D Mustang (on successful kickstarter completion).
Everything at the $50 level, plus a hard copy of the game\u2019s air combat strategy and tactics manual, and a spiral-bound copy of complete aircraft manuals for one flyable aircraft in the game.

ALPHA Tier 4. Everything at the $50 ORIGINAL level, plus a digital copy of DCS World FW-190D-9 with beta access (when available in early 2014), and a digital copy of DCS World P-51D Mustang (on successful kickstarter completion), plus ALPHA ACCESS.
MATRIX Tier 5. Everything at the $10 level, plus a digital copy of all flyable aircraft in the initial release, plus any FOUR extras.
MATRIX Tier 6. Everything at the $10 level, plus a digital copy of all flyable aircraft in the initial release, plus any FIVE extras.

DCS World Tier 4. Everything at the $50 level, plus TWO digital copies of DCS World FW-190D-9 with beta access (when available in early 2014), and TWO digital copies of DCS World P-51D Mustang (on successful kickstarter completion).  Share with a friend!
Everything at the $50 level, plus a hard copy of the game\u2019s air combat strategy and tactics manual, and spiral-bound copies of complete aircraft manuals for two flyable aircraft in the game.

ALPHA Tier 5. Everything at the $50 ORIGINAL level, plus TWO digital copies of DCS World FW-190D-9 with beta access (when available in early 2014), and TWO digital copies of DCS World P-51D Mustang (on successful kickstarter completion). Incldes only one invitation for ALPHA ACCESS.

Alpha Tier 6. Everything at the $50 ORIGINAL level, plus TWO digital copies of DCS World FW-190D-9 with beta access (when available in early 2014), and TWO digital copies of DCS World P-51D Mustang (on successful kickstarter completion). Includes two invitations for ALPHA ACCESS for yourself and for your friend.
MATRIX Tier 7. Everything at the $10 level, plus a digital copy of all flyable aircraft in the initial release, plus any SIX extras.
Everything at the previous level, a mention in the Special Thanks section of the game credits, plus a custom-designed project backer T-shirt.
MATRIX Tier 8. Everything at the $10 level, plus TWO digital copies of all flyable aircraft in the initial release, plus a mention in the Producers section of the game credits, plus any SEVEN extras.

Everything at the $80 level (two copies of the entire initial release to share with a friend), plus a hard copy of the game\u2019s air combat strategy and tactics manual, and spiral-bound copies of complete aircraft manuals for two flyable aircraft in the game, plus a digital copy of DCS World FW-190D-9 with beta access (when available in early 2014), and a digital copy of DCS World P-51D Mustang (on successful kickstarter completion), plus a mention in the Producers section of the game credits, plus ALPHA ACCESS.
Everything at the previous level, plus a custom-designed individualized paint scheme for an aircraft of your choice, made by one of our in-house experts.

Everything at the previous level, plus one additional set (TWO total) of digital copies of DCS World FW-190D-9 with beta access (when available in early 2014), and DCS World P-51D Mustang (on successful kickstarter completion), plus a custom-designed individualized paint scheme for an aircraft of your choice, made by one of our in-house experts.

Everything at the previous level, a large framed art print from the game signed by all key team members, plus access to weekly team development meetings via Skype where you can participate in some decision-making and keep up-to-date with the development process.
Everything at the previous level, plus your face on one of the in-game pilot models (space obviously very limited).
Everything at the previous level, plus your voice in the game, speaking for one of the AI-controlled pilots.

Everything at the previous level, and a special place as a unique in-game ace in the game encountered in single-player campaigns including your aircraft with a unique ace paintscheme, your voice, your likeness, and focus on your persona in the mission briefing.

Everything at the previous level, plus we\u2019ll host you in Moscow (visa and transportation is on you) for an entire day with the team, access to early builds, lunch with the development leads, and a night out on the town!
